channel.title: FearX rsps 667 need staff need players
channel.description:
19/04/2014 server started
New 667 with staff spots open Looking for; -admins -moderators -support/helpers these will be picked out by matt(me,the owner) co-owners(chewit/ash) and the head-admin(cristina)
The forums: http://fearxrsps.enjin.com/ Client download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n69v0cb00bj64sp/FearX.jar
If you do want to be a staff member then you must be active on the forums and in game. We encourage every player we get to join the forums as it only takes 2 seconds and it is the easiest way to get information out. Every player to join the forums will be given 10m and 1000 fog tokens to help you get started.
FEATURES: -Torva/primal/pk armour -Nex/corp/avatar of destruction -Castle wars(in progress, currently donor only, soon to change) -clan wars/duel areana(stake at your own risk) -dicing -glacors -All skills work including 120 dung -prestiging and prestige shop -max cape/comp cape -grand exchange and much more
Hope to see you in game soon!
FearX Owner, Matt. Sorry there is no picture, in a rush. Don't complain about no pictures. Will be posted at a later date.

item.title: FearX rsps 667 need staff need players
item.dc:creator: @FearXmatt FearXmatt
item.description:
